TopicTitle: hatch causes part not to load

Articles.Content: ive set up my airlock exactly as described in the wiki tutorial but it refuses to load, it loads without it but as soon as i add the airlock ccollider the part stops loading in game without so much as an eror message, what am i doing wrong?
You may want to double check the layer and tag names (Airlock and Part Triggers ( verbatim )), if these are misspelled, the part will refuse to load without explanation.
you nailed it... didnt realise it needed to be cap Airlock
